sense.gloss: suspension of business, temporary closure (of a store, school, etc.), shutdown, holiday

sdata.j: ↑急↑↓|きゅう↓↑行列↑↓ぎょう|れつ↓↑車↑↓しゃ↓は↑渋谷↑↓しぶや↓↑駅↑↓えき↓から↑中目黒↑↓なかめぐろ↓↑駅↑↓えき↓まで↑停車↑↓ていしゃ↓しません。
sdata.e: The express train does not stop between Shibuya and Naka-Meguro.

sdata.j: ↑急↑↓|きゅう↓↑行列↑↓ぎょう|れつ↓↑車↑↓しゃ↓はありますか。
↑急↑↓|きゅう↓↑行列↑↓ぎょう|れつ↓↑車↑↓しゃ↓が↑目↑↓め↓にとまらぬ↑速↑↓はや↓さで↑走↑↓はし↓りすぎていった。
sdata.e: The express train went by so fast that we hardly saw it.

sdata.e: Due to our office moving, we will be closed from May 30 to 31.

sdata.e: Sunday is a holiday in Christian countries.

sdata.e: Most shops near the school are closed on Saturdays now.

sdata.e: The manager put up a notice about the extra holiday.

sdata.e: Many of the city's leading restaurants close down for the whole of August.
